articles.description: Beating market estimates, ZEE has clocked EBITDA, or operating profit, of Rs 540.8 crore, as against an operating loss of Rs 283.9 crore in Q4FY20. EBITDA margin stood at 27.5%.
articles.content: MUMBAI: Indian entertainment major Zee Entertainment Enterprises (ZEE) has posted a profit after tax (PAT) of Rs 275.8 crore for the final quarter of the financial year ended March 31, 2021, compared… [+1836 chars]

articles.author: Sujata Sangwan
articles.title: [Funding alert] Magenta EV receives commitment in excess of $15M in Series A round - YourStory
articles.description: Eminent Indian-American philanthropist, cardiologist, and serial entrepreneur, Dr Kiran C Patel has committed over $ 15 million (Rs 120 crore) to Magenta EV Solutions with plans for additional future funding.
articles.content: Mumbai-based electric vehicle (EV) charging solutions company, Magenta EV Solutions Pvt Ltd has confirmed commitment of over $15 million (Rs 120 crore) in Series A funding from eminent Indian-America… [+2337 chars]
